filmography.title: This Gun for Hire
filmography.role_description: A cold, cat-loving hitman who seeks revenge on the employer who double-crossed him, becoming an unlikely anti-hero.
filmography.plot: A contract killer is double-crossed by his employer and goes on the run, aided by a nightclub singer who tries to reform him.
filmography.awards: National Board of Review: Best Acting (Alan Ladd)

filmography.title: The Glass Key
filmography.role_description: The loyal, cool-headed right-hand man to a political boss who navigates a web of corruption to clear his friend of murder.
filmography.plot: A political fixer tries to clear his boss of a murder charge while dealing with gangsters and corrupt politicians.

filmography.title: Lucky Jordan
filmography.role_description: A racketeer drafted into the army who deserts but ends up fighting a ring of Nazi spies to save his country.
filmography.plot: A gangster tries to dodge the draft but ends up getting involved with stopping a Nazi spy ring.

filmography.title: China
filmography.role_description: A cynical American oil salesman in war-torn China who finds his conscience and helps civilians fight Japanese invaders.
filmography.plot: An opportunistic American businessman in China is forced to choose a side when he witnesses Japanese atrocities.

filmography.title: And Now Tomorrow
filmography.role_description: A dedicated doctor from the wrong side of the tracks who treats a wealthy deaf woman and challenges her snobbery.
filmography.plot: A doctor tries to restore the hearing of a wealthy woman while dealing with their class differences and romantic tension.

filmography.title: Salty O'Rourke
filmography.role_description: A gambler who owes money to a mobster and stakes everything on a jockey with a shady past.
filmography.plot: A gambler facing a deadline to pay off a debt tries to fix a horse race using a jockey who is underage.

filmography.title: The Blue Dahlia
filmography.role_description: A war veteran who comes home to find his wife unfaithful and becomes the prime suspect when she is murdered.
filmography.plot: A returning war veteran is accused of murdering his unfaithful wife and must find the real killer in the seedy Los Angeles underworld.
filmography.awards: Oscar Nomination: Best Original Screenplay (Raymond Chandler)

filmography.title: O.S.S.
filmography.role_description: An American officer trained for espionage who is sent into Nazi-occupied France to sabotage the railway system.
filmography.plot: A group of American agents are trained and sent into occupied France to disrupt the Nazi war machine.

filmography.title: Two Years Before the Mast
filmography.role_description: The son of a ship owner who is shanghaied onto one of his father's vessels and experiences the brutal life of a common sailor.
filmography.plot: A wealthy playboy is forced to work as a crewman on a ship where the captain tyrannizes the sailors.

filmography.title: Calcutta
filmography.role_description: A commercial pilot who investigates the mysterious strangulation of his friend in India, uncovering a smuggling ring.
filmography.plot: A pilot investigates the murder of his friend in Calcutta and gets involved with a beautiful but dangerous woman.

filmography.title: Wild Harvest
filmography.role_description: A tough wheat harvester whose friendship with his partner is tested by rivalry and a manipulative woman.
filmography.plot: The leader of a wheat-harvesting crew deals with mechanical troubles, rival crews, and a woman who comes between him and his best friend.

filmography.title: Saigon
filmography.role_description: An ex-Army pilot who agrees to fly a mysterious passenger to Saigon to help a terminally ill friend.
filmography.plot: Three war buddies undertake a dangerous flying mission in Southeast Asia, discovering smuggling and romance along the way.

filmography.title: Whispering Smith
filmography.role_description: A soft-spoken railroad detective who must bring his best friend to justice after he turns to crime.
filmography.plot: A railroad detective is forced to hunt down his old friend who has joined a gang of train robbers.

filmography.title: Beyond Glory
filmography.role_description: A war veteran studying at West Point who is haunted by the death of his commanding officer and faces a tribunal.
filmography.plot: A decorated war veteran enrolling at West Point faces a court-martial over a past mission while trying to move on.

filmography.title: The Great Gatsby
filmography.role_description: The mysterious millionaire who throws lavish parties in an attempt to win back his lost love, Daisy Buchanan.
filmography.plot: A bootlegger turned millionaire tries to rekindle a romance with a married woman in 1920s Long Island.

filmography.title: Chicago Deadline
filmography.role_description: A tenacious reporter who reconstructs the life of a woman found dead in a boarding house through her address book.
filmography.plot: A reporter investigates the death of a young woman by tracking down the names listed in her little black book.

filmography.title: Captain Carey, U.S.A.
filmography.role_description: A former OSS officer who returns to Italy after the war to unmask the traitor who betrayed his team.
filmography.plot: A former American agent returns to an Italian village to find the person who betrayed his unit to the Nazis.
filmography.awards: Oscar Win: Best Original Song ('Mona Lisa')

filmography.title: Branded
filmography.role_description: A gunman who poses as the long-lost son of a wealthy rancher to swindle him, but develops a conscience.
filmography.plot: A drifter poses as the missing son of a wealthy rancher but decides to help the family find the real heir.

filmography.title: Appointment with Danger
filmography.role_description: A cynical postal inspector who goes undercover to infiltrate a gang planning a million-dollar mail robbery.
filmography.plot: A postal inspector goes undercover to find the killers of a fellow officer and stop a heist.

filmography.title: The Iron Mistress
filmography.role_description: The legendary frontiersman and knife fighter, depicting his adventures in New Orleans and the forging of his famous knife.
filmography.plot: A fictionalized account of the life of Jim Bowie, focusing on his romances and the creation of the Bowie knife.

filmography.title: Shane
filmography.role_description: A weary gunfighter who tries to settle down with a homesteading family but is forced to pick up his guns to protect them.
filmography.plot: A weary gunfighter attempts to settle down with a homestead family, but a smoldering settler/rancher conflict forces him to act.
filmography.awards: Oscar Win: Best Cinematography; National Film Registry

filmography.title: Botany Bay
filmography.role_description: An American medical student wrongly convicted and sent on a brutal convict ship to Australia.
filmography.plot: Prisoners on a convict ship bound for Australia plan a mutiny against the cruel captain.

filmography.title: Hell Below Zero
filmography.role_description: An American adventurer who signs onto a whaling ship to help a woman investigate her father's suspicious death.
filmography.plot: An American joins a whaling expedition in the Antarctic to help a woman find her father's killer.

filmography.title: Drum Beat
filmography.role_description: A veteran Indian fighter appointed by President Grant to negotiate peace with the Modoc tribe.
filmography.plot: A peace commissioner tries to negotiate with the Modoc Indians but is forced into battle when the truce is broken.

filmography.title: The Proud Rebel
filmography.role_description: A Confederate veteran wandering the North in search of a doctor to cure his mute son, played by his real-life son David Ladd.
filmography.plot: A Confederate veteran seeks a doctor for his mute son and finds work on the farm of a woman threatened by a ruthless landowner.

filmography.title: The Carpetbaggers
filmography.role_description: A washed-up Western film star who becomes a mentor to a young tycoon; Ladd's final major role before his death.
filmography.plot: A wealthy playboy inherits an aviation company and goes to Hollywood, crossing paths with an aging cowboy star.
